lines.text: [Seeing a giant dragonfly at the window, she screams]
Don't open the door! It'll escape!
I don't know! We'll find out when we catch it!
Unless we learn to control the instincts we/ve inherited from our ape-like ancestors, the race is doomed.
Why don't you learn to control your instincts and stop being so pessimistic?
You know, you're right, and when I look at you, the future's very bright.
Ah, the human female in the perfect state - helpless and silent.
